name: extend_rental
attributes: # [doc = " レンタル期間を延長し、延長料金を徴収するが、"]
# [doc = " rental_account.owner と ctx.accounts.user.key() の一致検証がない"]
body: let rental = & mut ctx . accounts . rental_account ;
let fee = (extra_time as u64) . checked_mul (cfg . fee_per_second) . unwrap () ;
* * ctx . accounts . user . to_account_info () . lamports . borrow_mut () -= fee ;
* * ctx . accounts . fee_pool . to_account_info () . lamports . borrow_mut () += fee ;
rental . end_time = rental . end_time . checked_add (extra_time) . unwrap () ;
rental . extension_count = rental . extension_count . checked_add (1) . unwrap () ;

fields.name: rental_account
fields.attribute: # [account (mut)] # [doc = " 本来は #[account(has_one = owner)] を指定して所有者照合を行うべき"]

fields.name: fee_pool
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 延長料金を集めるプールアカウント"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: user
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 延長をリクエストするユーザー（署名者）"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: config
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 延長料金単価を保持する設定アカウント"]

fields.name: owner
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 本来この契約を所有するべき貸し手の Pubkey"]

fields.name: renter
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 本来この契約を行った借り手の Pubkey"]

fields.name: start_time
fields.attribute: # [doc = " レンタル開始時刻 (UNIXタイム)"]

fields.name: end_time
fields.attribute: # [doc = " レンタル終了時刻 (UNIXタイム)"]

fields.name: fee_per_second
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 延長 1 秒あたりの料金 (Lamports)"]
